entry.title: Exsqueeze ME?
entry.content: Messing around with JUCE, as I’m working on a utility for audio processing. Why are my eyes glazing over?
entry.summary: Messing around with JUCE, as I’m working on a utility for audio processing. Why are my eyes glazing over?

entry.title: Check one, check two…. is this thing on?

link.title: Check one, check two.... is this thing on?

entry.content: In order to experiment with the basics of Tensorflow, I installed it and Jupyter on a Digital Ocean box I am not using much . Useful for experimenting with syntax, but only very small scale without GPU or much memory. My aspiration is to experiment with, and perhaps contribute to project Magenta. Looks like I’m going to have to invest in some hardware.
